briefdescription.para: Sets the rs flag to the given value.

parameterdescription.para: rs == 1 -> data RS = HIGH, rs == 0 -> command RS = LOW

briefdescription.para: Pulses the EN pin HIGH wait 450ns and then LOW wait 450ns.
Sends a nibble to the LCD.

parameterdescription.para: RS | R/W | DB4 | DB5 | DB6 | DB7

briefdescription.para: Sends a byte to the LCD.

parameterdescription.para: Display shift sc = 1, Cursor move sc = 0
Right shift rl = 1, Left shift rl = 0

briefdescription.para: Sets the entry mode of the LCD.

parameterdescription.para: I / D = 1: Increment, I / D = 0: Decrement.
S = 1: The display shift, S = 0: The display does not shift.

briefdescription.para: Controls the display, cursor, and blinking.

parameterdescription.para: D = 1: Display on, D = 0: Display off
C = 1: Cursor on, C = 0: Cursor off
B = 1: Blinks on, B= 0: Blinks off
N = 0: One-line display. N = 1: Two-line display
F = 0: 5 x 8 dots character font. F = 1: 5 x 10 dots character font.

briefdescription.para: Prints a character to the LCD.
Prints a string to the LCD.
Prints a character to the LCD at a given position.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned char row, unsigned char col, unsigned char length, unsigned char is_vertical)
memberdef.name: LcdDrawLine

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned char row, unsigned char col, unsigned char length, unsigned char width)
memberdef.name: LcdDrawBox
